items.subTitle: Overview
items.contents: The Department of Mathematics, established in 2009, serves as a strong academic backbone for the institution by delivering rigorous training in mathematical sciences and statistics. The Department offers full-time postgraduate and research programmes, including M.Sc. in Mathematics and Ph.D. in Mathematics, with a focus on developing both theoretical understanding and practical problem-solving skills. The Department actively supports interdisciplinary learning by providing foundational and allied courses to various departments. Through a structured curriculum, continuous assessment and research-oriented learning, students are trained to think logically, analyze complex problems and apply mathematical principles to real-world challenges.The Department has built a strong academic reputation through consistent student performance, successful alumni and active research contributions. Research activities are carried out in specialized areas such as Fuzzy Mathematics, Differential Equations, Queueing Theory, Fluid Dynamics and Fuzzy Topology, leading to publications in reputed journals. With a commitment to academic integrity, innovation and excellence, the Department of Mathematics continues to evolve as a centre for learning, research and professional development.

items.subTitle: Vision
content: To enable students to acquire understanding of mathematics and mathematical applications.

items.subTitle: Mission
content: To develop analytical and logical thinking of students.
To encourage students to develop mathematical models.
To make students as professionals with social and economic responsibilities.
To encourage collaborative research with other disciplines.

content.caption: Professor and Head
content.content: Welcome to the Department of Mathematics. It gives me great pleasure to address students, parents and visitors to our department. Mathematics is the language of science, technology and innovation, and our department strives to nurture a deep appreciation for its beauty, logic and real-world applications. Our focus is not only on delivering strong theoretical foundations but also on developing critical thinking, analytical abilities and independent learning skills among our students. We encourage a culture of curiosity, creativity and ethical academic practice, enabling learners to grow into confident individuals who can contribute meaningfully to society. The Department provides a supportive academic environment where students are guided by committed faculty members who mentor them in both academics and research. Through seminars, workshops, guest lectures and research-oriented activities, we strive to expose our students to recent developments and practical applications in mathematical sciences. I warmly invite you to become a part of our academic journey and explore the opportunities that our department offers for personal growth, intellectual development and professional success.

basic.title: Faculty
basic.description: The faculty of the Department of Mathematics comprises experienced academicians dedicated to excellence in teaching, research, and mentoring. They emphasize strong analytical foundations, logical reasoning, and applied mathematical skills, preparing students to succeed in academics, research, and interdisciplinary fields.
